article.description: Quinton Hooker scored 26 points with six steals, five rebounds, and four assists and Connor Avants added 15 points to lift North Dakota past Northern Colorado 87-77 in overtime on Saturday.
article.headline: Hooker, North Dakota take down N. Colorado 87-77 in OT
article.linkText: Hooker, North Dakota take down N. Colorado 87-77 in OT
article.story: GRAND FORKS, N.D. -- Quinton Hooker scored 26 points with six steals, five rebounds, and four assists and Connor Avants added 15 points to lift North Dakota past Northern Colorado 87-77 in overtime on Saturday. North Dakota (13-8, 8-3 Big Sky) used a 9-0 run to start overtime. DJ Miles hit a 3 and followed with a layup to bring Northern Colorado to within 80-77 with 56 seconds to go but the Bears couldn't get closer. Jordan Davis made a layup with three seconds left going coast-to-coast to tie it at 69 to force overtime. Hooker made a pair of free throws with nine seconds left to put North Dakota up 69-67. After Chazz Glotta's 3 with 78 seconds left put the Bears up 67-64, Avants converted a 3-point play off a layup, tying it at 67 with 41 seconds left in regulation. Geno Crandall had 13 points for the Fighting Hawks, Corey Baldwin had 12 before fouling out, and Cortez Seales had 11. Drick Bernstine grabbed 10 rebounds and blocked three shots for North Dakota. Glotta led Northern Colorado (8-14, 4-7) with 22 points and Davis had 18.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
